function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High dependence on migrant workers in the construction sector","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased labor working hours without addressing labor concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impact on labor costs, project costs, and recovery of damages","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity and proper guidance in the virtual workforce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in the construction sector","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption in work and movement of labor due to economic recession and covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Liquidity risk may cause work stoppage due to fragile economic scenario","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimating the full financial impact of the coronavirus crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited budget and low innovation and technology in facility management services due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Escalation of cement and sand prices by 5% due to supply chain disruption and less availability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disputes between client and contractor regarding loss-sharing and claims due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low client satisfaction and service quality in the indian construction and real estate sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low prevalence of lean construction and skilled contractors/workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of value-based approach in indian construction sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low implementation of value engineering in construction projects","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited functionality improvement with new technology","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of project overrun and delay","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on environmental protection and social issues","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address sustainable development goals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disregard for sustainable consumption and production","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Current covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human health risk of global magnitude","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of human health in sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of inclusion of human health in the definition of sustainability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address physical and mental health as a separate fourth pillar of sustainability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of ’society’ as inclusive of human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on mental health due to covid-19, including economic instability, domestic violence, and fear among healthcare workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic instability, decreased conservation efforts, and plummeting economy due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in human activity leading to unattended and endangered species","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Devastating global economic fallout from covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure on corporations to reevaluate globalized supply chain systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic inequality leading to unequal access to resources such as stable homes, internet, and technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases for individuals in lower income brackets due to employment in service or delivery sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to online learning resources for lower income individuals, exacerbating educational disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize human health in sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic as a result of neglecting public health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Separation of health from other sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of respiratory pandemics like covid-19 in urban settings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of communicable diseases in ’healthy urban planning’ literature and policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of health and wellbeing dimensions in urban planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission within and between cities and city regions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social and economic consequences of implementing public health measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of literature reviews on the connection between npis and urban planning and design in the context of pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in fitting broad urban planning and design concepts into systematic review approaches for npis in pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less stringent approach to reviewing the literature, such as rapid reviews, leading to scope for heterogeneity in the employment of rapid reviews","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Examination of multi-disciplinary literature on how planning and designing cities intersects with pandemics of infectious respiratory diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limiting search terms based on authors’ personal interests may lead to overlooking important aspects of the intersection between pandemics and urban planning.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid review process may result in overlooking key studies and relevant literature, leading to biased conclusions and recommendations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of formal quality appraisal tool used in the review","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Considerable overlap between themes and papers crossing themes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
